name: Evoqua Water Technologies Corp.
description: Evoqua Water Technologies Corp. is a leading global provider of water and wastewater treatment solutions, dedicated to helping municipalities and industrial customers manage their water resources responsibly and effectively. Founded in 2014, Evoqua has a rich history stemming from several legacy companies in the water treatment sector, bringing over a century of combined expertise to the market. The company offers a broad range of products and services, including advanced filtration systems, disinfection technologies, and biosolids management solutions, aimed at enhancing water quality and ensuring compliance with regulatory standards. Evoqua's innovative approaches include sustainable practices for water reuse and reclamation, addressing the growing demand for efficient water management in an era of increasing water scarcity. The company's commitment to sustainability is evident in its efforts to optimize water use and reduce environmental impact, thereby contributing to a more sustainable future. With a robust portfolio that spans various industries, including municipal, industrial, and commercial sectors, Evoqua is positioned as a trusted partner in the water treatment space.
